scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a procession of haloed figures carrying a richly decorated red ark, possibly the Ark of the Covenant, on poles. The figures are dressed in flowing robes of red, green, and pink. One figure in a blue robe, also haloed, walks in front of the ark, holding a book. The background is a simple blue sky with a hint of green landscape at the bottom. The entire scene is contained within a circular frame, surrounded by decorative floral motifs.
scene_interpretation: Procession of the Ark of the Covenant
